name: Traffic Racing - Racer Speed
description:
Traffic Racing - Racer Speed!
It’s time to mild up your highway ride, traffic racing game, real highway rider driving games in traffic skills. Enjoy the traffic rider fun crazy, highway traffic speed simulator, highway turbo car traffic and car rush driving simulator.
Features:
- Beautiful graphics
- Tap to accelerate
- Release to slow down
- Auto speed ups
- Collect coins
